pkgmetadata.longdescription: Toolbox for Downloading and Extracting Copernicus AgERA5 Data // Tools for downloading and extracting data from the Copernicus "Agrometeorological indicators from 1979 to present derived from reanalysis" https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu/cdsapp#!/dataset/sis- agrometeorological-indicators?tab=overview (AgERA5).
